original_text: They took a stick and they hit him on the head with it many times. They spat on him. Then they went down on their knees in front of him. They told him how great he was.
korean_text: 갈대로 그의 머리를 치며 침을 뱉으며 꿇어 절하더라

sentences.original_text: and they hit him on the head with it many times
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그것으로 그의 머리를 여러 번 쳤다

sentences.original_text: Then they went down on their knees
They told him how great he was
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 그에게 그가 얼마나 위대한지 말했다
